about_the_game:
THE NEXT-GEN MMORTS

Ever wanted to play a sci-fi game that is an MMO with a single persistent SANDBOX universe instead of 100+ game worlds, that offers real-time strategy combat, an RPG storyline with thousands of fully voiced-over lines of dialogue, an awesome community, faction vs faction warfare with battles with thousands of simultaneous players on an unprecedented scale... If you answered yes, this is your game.

COMMAND INTERSTELLAR FLEETS

Customize fleets of starships catered to your play style and tactics. Fly off into the galaxy and fight real time strategy battles!

BUILD YOUR EMPIRE

When you start the game, you will be located in a remote sector of space on a newly built starbase. From this base, you can construct buildings that increase the defensive and offensive capabilities of your base and fleets. There are many different types of buildings available for you to build, including those used to create fleets, those that provide technological upgrades, and those that provide a steady stream of resources for continued construction and research.

COMMAND INTERSTELLAR FLEETS

You can create powerful fleets to defend your base and attack your enemies. Fleets are composed of specialized components that follow a "rock paper scissors" style combat model. However, keeping your fleets in good condition requires upkeep, repair, and upgrades, which can be costly. One way to offset these costs and keep your empire growing is by conquering and raiding enemy bases, both those controlled by other players and those controlled by NPC enemies.

Enter Center Space

Players can expand their empires into Center Space by building more starbases to earn bonuses for their faction. To this end, they can form or join alliances with other players of the same faction to maximize their ability to contend with their opponents. This kind of large-tent encouragement keeps seasoned players playing and keeps new players coming back.

GALAXY FULL OF DANGER

Your starbase is in constant danger but you and your faction can fend off all would be attackers. Players can build stalwart defenses around their starbase to protect them from both enemy player and NPC armies, and help protect their allies from attack with their fleets. Strategy is paramount as enemy players create more powerful fleets with which to raid and pillage.

BE THE PIRATE!

It’s a dog eat dog galaxy and you’re out to make your faction the top dog. By playing aggressively, players can gain more resources and amass greater strength. Attacking other player’s starbases is a good way to take their resources and reduce their effectiveness, thereby reducing their threat to you and your faction while equipping your to surpass them even further.

FORM ALLIANCES

The strength is in numbers. Team up with other players, build alliances to achieve greater goals together. By teaming up with other players you will gain more points and have a higher ability.

BREAK ALLIANCES

Look out for spies, or become one! Infiltrate other alliances to gain valuable intel, use that information and power to your & your alliance's advantage. If you desire you can get into the politics of the war game and by learning who is whom up your game on the galactic scene.

PLAY FREE

Explore, save or conquer the Maelstorm Galaxy for free! You can spend money to speed up the process. Only pay if you would like to support the project. Some of our top players haven't spent a single dime on the game and hold number one spots on some of the leaderboards. Story Campaigns quests and over thousands of custom, hand-made as well as player-designed Missions are available and designed so you can enjoy the game without having to pay or wait!

FREQUENT UPDATES - Over 150 Bulk patches and years of development

Nine races, three faction, one universe full of secrets and adventures! Fully voiced characters at your command to help you rise your empire and write your own journey. Thousands of player ready to rumble, 9000 achievements to get, story driven campaign and over 10 000 missions available from the start. Frequent raids and events to keep it spicy!

10,000 vs. 10,000?

IGW is a space game where you can have massive REAL TIME battles with thousands of players. The game was built by a veteran team at Kabam Austin. The studio was led by the legendary MMO developer Mike Wallis, one of the original creators EVE Online. 10k vs 10k players… Not a problem!

Large Community & Serious Play

IGW is a decade old Community and was played by over a million players in its lifetime. There are countless stories, millions of battles that happened in our little universe!

WEEKLY UPDATES

Imperium: Galactic War has been actively updated and expanded with a total of over 200 official patches and 700+ updates. Our team is adding new gameplay content on a weekly basis which ensures that players always have something to do in the game.

reviews:
“It’s fun, it generally works as intended, and it’s the main reason you should play Imperium if you’re at all drawn to social strategy. The main appeal here lies in the way Imperium lets you maneuver ships away from enemy fire, such as the way it allows you to rotate around enemy ships in order to stay just one step ahead of most of the gunfire. Even better, the whole concept is complemented by a dizzying array of upgrades, weapons, and actual ships, resulting in an experience that’s more akin to space strategy games like Sins of a Solar Empire than the average Facebook game.”
4.5/5 – Gamezebo
short_description: Imperium: Galactic War is a free-to-play science-fiction strategy game of galactic warfare, empire building, and untold glory. Three mighty factions struggle for supremacy of a battle-torn universe. Some fight for peace, others for glory and conquest, and others seek only profit, power and chaos.
